metadata.title: Phylodynamic analysis of avian infectious bronchitis virus in South America

FIGREF0.text: Fig. 1. : Phylogenetic tree inferred by using the maximum-likelihood method with GTR+I+G substitution model. Phylogenetic reconstruction was carried out using the full-length S1 coding region of South American IBV strains and reference strains. Mapping uncertainties for internal nodes are shown as approximate likelihood ratio test values.

FIGREF1.text: Fig. 2. : Posterior probability densities for the tMRCA inferences for SAI and A/SAII genotypes. The SAI genotype dataset (n = 81) comprised strains collected from 1975 to 2012, and the A/SAII genotype dataset (n = 25) comprised strains collected from 1996 to 2011. Vertical dashed lines represent the mean estimated time for each ancestor and coloured boxes reflect the 95 % high probability density values.

FIGREF2.text: Fig. 3. : Phylogenetic tree inferred by using the maximum-likelihood method with GTR+I+G substitution model. Phylogenetic reconstruction was carried out using the full-length N gene sequence of South American IBV strains and reference strains. Mapping uncertainties for internal nodes are shown as approximate likelihood ratio test values.
